line.text: 'These are optimized trade settings. The idea is to sell what you not need.'
'Combine modules correctly in order (1,2,3) or you might override previous settings.'
'You can make changes afterwards, delete all wares to abort and sell nothing.'
'Your Outposts also trade with each other. Food, etc. will be distributed in your empire.'
'^always recommended. Makes Traders stop burning cash and Loot gets sold.'
' - do not sell factory resources unless stock is greater than ~5 full factory loads'
' - buy factory resources if stock is smaller than ~1 full factory load'
'^already includes Factory Reserve module to prevent selling off again.'
' - keep all station construction parts. But sell very large stocks.'
'^Station Crafting Reserve already included to prevent selling off again.'
' - keep all ship parts and equipment. But sell super large stocks.'
' - buy ship parts for ~15 million total cost'
'^also buys crystals to craft lasers/shields and color crystals for equipment.'
'^Shipyard Reserve already included to prevent selling off again.'
' - same as Lavish but only ~2 million total cost'
' - buy Silicon for at least 100k, sell all missles but always keep 300 of each in here. No Strict Import'
' - buy Crystals for at least 200k, sell all lasers/shields but keep a stock worth 200k of each in here. No Strict Import'
'^can be modified in the Station Settings screen of your Personal Console.'
'Traders look for this Outpost's needs first, then external trade opportunities between all open stations.'
'Outpost needs are listed below. Traders from all factions will look to import-export them, if allowed.'
'To know the needs of NPC Outposts, see the Station information menu in your Personal console.'
'Traders respect the maximum sector distance setting of this Outpost, but cannot exceed 8 jumps.'
'Import thresholds read as follow: "if the stock is less than threshold, then it is importable".'
'Export thresholds read as follow: "if the stock is greater or equal to threshold, then it is exportable".'
'By default, a newly added ware is non-importable and non-exportable.'
'Save these wares in a new preset'
'All Traders importing to this Outpost will never load cargo above the import threshold.'
'This does not apply to Outpost Food like Meat or Fruit. (but can be enabled in the t-file)'
'All Traders exporting from this Outpost will never load cargo below the export threshold.'
'You can limit your budget for every external trade. If set to 0, your Traders will only care about this Outpost's needs, if open.'
'This Outpost is open to other traders'
'This Outpost is open to your traders'
'Affects external trade, Looters and Collect Wares In Sector.'

sval.val: These are optimized trade settings. The idea is to sell what you not need.
Combine modules correctly in order (1,2,3) or you might override previous settings.
You can make changes afterwards, delete all wares to abort and sell nothing.
Your Outposts also trade with each other. Food, etc. will be distributed in your empire.
^always recommended. Makes Traders stop burning cash and Loot gets sold.
- do not sell factory resources unless stock is greater than ~5 full factory loads
- buy factory resources if stock is smaller than ~1 full factory load
^already includes Factory Reserve module to prevent selling off again.
- keep all station construction parts. But sell very large stocks.
^Station Crafting Reserve already included to prevent selling off again.
- keep all ship parts and equipment. But sell super large stocks.
- buy ship parts for ~15 million total cost
^also buys crystals to craft lasers/shields and color crystals for equipment.
^Shipyard Reserve already included to prevent selling off again.
- same as Lavish but only ~2 million total cost
- buy Silicon for at least 100k, sell all missles but always keep 300 of each in here. No Strict Import
- buy Crystals for at least 200k, sell all lasers/shields but keep a stock worth 200k of each in here. No Strict Import
^can be modified in the Station Settings screen of your Personal Console.
Traders look for this Outpost's needs first, then external trade opportunities between all open stations.
Outpost needs are listed below. Traders from all factions will look to import-export them, if allowed.
To know the needs of NPC Outposts, see the Station information menu in your Personal console.
Traders respect the maximum sector distance setting of this Outpost, but cannot exceed 8 jumps.
Import thresholds read as follow: "if the stock is less than threshold, then it is importable".
Export thresholds read as follow: "if the stock is greater or equal to threshold, then it is exportable".
By default, a newly added ware is non-importable and non-exportable.
Save these wares in a new preset
All Traders importing to this Outpost will never load cargo above the import threshold.
This does not apply to Outpost Food like Meat or Fruit. (but can be enabled in the t-file)
All Traders exporting from this Outpost will never load cargo below the export threshold.
You can limit your budget for every external trade. If set to 0, your Traders will only care about this Outpost's needs, if open.
This Outpost is open to other traders
This Outpost is open to your traders
Affects external trade, Looters and Collect Wares In Sector.
